exercise_2::clip_card_3::goals[0]: Result clips show the result of your process. Show the result in context.
exercise_2::text_card_3::text: Trim any clip by tapping the clip image.
exercise_2::text_card_0::text: Using no more than three of the clips provided, shoot a process story.
exercise_2::text_card_5::text: By pressing "Order" on the next card, you will be able to review your clips, when you are happy with them, press publish.
exercise_2::text_card_2::text: Some examples of process stories you can tell with 3 shots are: making coffee, writing a letter, packing a suitcase, making a sandwich.
exercise_2::text_card_1::text: This story can be brief, your goal is to use three different shots to illustrate an activity with a beginning, middle and end.
exercise_2::text_card_4::text: If you recorded clips in more than three cards, be sure to delete all but 3 clips before you publish.
exercise_2::clip_card_4::goals[0]: Signature clips show a very specific detail, can be the result or primary action. Get close!
exercise_2::text_card_7::text: When you finish uploading, return to class.
exercise_2::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Place clips are good for establishing where your process story happens.

exercise_2::clip_card_1::goals[0]: Character clips show us who is affected by or causing the process.
